game.name: Dreaminal
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: DREAMINAL is a deeply immersive horror experience for 1-4 players. Sent from a megacorp to be the "pioneer" of solving a global problem, but you quickly discover things aren't as they promised. Survive and find your way out of the Backrooms... if escape is even possible.
game.shortDescriptionEn: DREAMINAL is a deeply immersive horror experience for 1-4 players. Sent from a megacorp to be the "pioneer" of solving a global problem, but you quickly discover things aren't as they promised. Survive and find your way out of the Backrooms... if escape is even possible.
